title: How to Play Video Games Successfully

steps.headline: Calm Down.
steps.description: Take deep breaths before you play and remind yourself that it is just a game.

steps.headline: Play with caution.
steps.description: Whether you're walking through a cave with Yoshi, or soaring through the skies with Mario, have a good idea of what's around you.

steps.headline: Hit Pause.
steps.description: Frequently hitting the pause button gives us a chance to breathe.

steps.headline: Form a strategy.
steps.description: The level or stage has to be beaten some how. What are your characters abilities? Can you use these to get around the obstacle?

steps.headline: Remember to blink, otherwise your eyes may dry out and will start to over-produce tears in response.
steps.description: This is especially important if you are gaming with someone in the same room, they could get the wrong idea. You won't live it down. Ever.

text: Calm Down. Take deep breaths before you play and remind yourself that it is just a game. Play with caution. Whether you're walking through a cave with Yoshi, or soaring through the skies with Mario, have a good idea of what's around you. Hit Pause. Frequently hitting the pause button gives us a chance to breathe. Form a strategy. The level or stage has to be beaten some how. What are your characters abilities? Can you use these to get around the obstacle? Remember to blink, otherwise your eyes may dry out and will start to over-produce tears in response. This is especially important if you are gaming with someone in the same room, they could get the wrong idea. You won't live it down. Ever.
